import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Form, Col, InputGroup, Button, OverlayTrigger, Tooltip } from 'react-bootstrap'; import '../index.css' class BondPricingOne extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { showTooltip: { visibility: 'visible' } }; this.onUpdateEnter = this.onUpdateEnter.bind(this) } onUpdateEnter(e) { e.preventDefault(); setTimeout(() => { this.setState({ showTooltip: { visibility: 'hidden' } }) }, 3500) } onSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); const series_map = { 'EE Bond': 'EE', 'E Bond': 'E', 'I Bond': 'I', 'Savings Bond': 'S' } let aMonth = e.target.aMonth.value let aYear = e.target.aYear.value let series = series_map[e.target.series.value] let denomination = e.target.denomination.value let serialNumber = e.target.serialnumber.value let iMonth = e.target.iMonth.value let iYear = e.target.iYear.value console.log(aMonth, aYear, series, denomination, serialNumber, iMonth, iYear) } render() { return (
VALUE AS OF / Revalue all bonds by this date. }> SERIES DENOMINATION SERIAL NUMBER ISSUE DATE /
) } } export default BondPricingOne;
